Detailed Description

This is a set of 2d utilities functions used by GTRACK Algorithm.

Function Documentation

uint8_t gtrack_isInsideBoresightStaticZone ( GTRACK_measurement_vector *  v)

Description
This function checks whether measurement point is within the boresigh static zone

Parameters
[in]vPointer to measurements (spheriacl form) vector
Return values
1if inside, 0 is otherwise
uint8_t gtrack_isInsideSolidAngle ( GTRACK_measurement_vector *  aError,
GTRACK_measurement_vector *  spread 
)

Description
This function checks whether angular error is less than angular spread

Parameters
[in]aErrorPointer to measurements (spheriacl form) vector
[in]spreadPointer to measurements (spheriacl form) vector, representing estimation of target spread
Return values
1if behind, 0 is otherwise
uint8_t gtrack_isPointBehindTarget ( GTRACK_measurement_vector *  p,
GTRACK_measurement_vector *  uC,
GTRACK_measurement_vector *  spread 
)

Description
This function checks whether measurement point P is geometrically behind the target and has simialr doppler

Parameters
[in]pPointer to measurements (spheriacl form) vector
[in]uCPointer to measurements (spheriacl form) vector, representing target centroid
[in]spreadPointer to measurements (spheriacl form) vector, representing estimation of target spread
Return values
1if behind, 0 is otherwise
